definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

pinyin: kuai4 ji4 zhun3 ze2 li3 shi4 hui4

sentences.english: I will graduate from eking University this July. I have majored in accounting.
sentences.chinese: 今年七月將從北京大學畢業，我主修的專業是會計學。

sentences.english: The boss promoted him to the post of chief accountant.
sentences.chinese: 老闆提升他爲會計室主任。

sentences.english: Project-based ecosystem services accounting has its limitations, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而作爲項目基礎的生態系統服務會計有其侷限性。

sentences.english: Accounting major cultivates applied talents with high comprehensive quality, strong professional skills.
sentences.chinese: 會計專業培養綜合素質高，專業技能強的應用型人才。

sentences.english: Why do companies spend so much on accountants?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼一個公司要花費那麼多來僱傭會計人員？

sentences.english: Mr. Smith was succeeded by Mrs. Jones as treasurer.
sentences.chinese: 瓊斯夫人繼史密斯先生任會計。

sentences.english: Modern capital market in essence is a market of accounting information.
sentences.chinese: 現代資本市場在本質上就是一個會計信息市場。

sentences.english: It had not been a bilateral decision with his wife to steal those documents.
sentences.chinese: 他從會計室竊取有價證券的所有證據。

sentences.english: The revision of Accounting Law is a great event in the accounting reform of our country.
sentences.chinese: 《會計法》的修訂是我國會計改革的一件大事。

sentences.english: The revision of Accounting Law is a great event in the accounting reform of our country.
sentences.chinese: 《會計法》的修訂是我國會計改革的一件大事。

sentences.english: Financial instruments accounting standards (FIAS) are more complex and special than other accounting standards.
sentences.chinese: 金融工具準則在企業會計準則體系中較爲特殊和複雜。

sentences.english: At least hold accountant certificate specialize in accounting or budget.
sentences.chinese: 擁有會計師或預算師資格。

sentences.english: Your accountant should help you set up these systems.
sentences.chinese: 你的會計應該幫你制定這些制度。

sentences.english: The accounting rules as they stand allow the practice.
sentences.chinese: 它們執行的會計準則允許這種做法。

sentences.english: In the United States, the certification examinations are prepared and administrated by the American institute of Certified Public Accountants (AICPA).
sentences.chinese: 在美國，這種考試由美國註冊會計師協會負責和實施。

sentences.english: This article deals with automatic entry method of microcomputer business accounting system.
sentences.chinese: 本文詳細介紹了微機商業會計自動化分錄登帳方法。

definition: specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
hook (on which to hang sth)/to couple/to link together/to establish contact with/hook/coupling links (e.g. between two railway coaches)
state enterprise/(Tw) abbr. for 國際企業管理|国际企业管理, international business management (as a subject of study)
